raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


VC was used as a positive control in all tests, and the IC50 (total antioxidant capacity and reducing power, corresponding to the absorbance value of 0.5; the other 50% clearance) of the sample and VC were calculated based on the test results, and the VC equivalent weight of the sample (mg VC per gram of proteoglycan, i.e. IC50 of VC divided by IC50 of proteoglycan) was calculated.
